title: US antitrust case against Amazon to move forward
description: The U.S. FTC's case against Amazon for anti-competitive practices in online retail will proceed, but some state claims were dismissed. Judge John Chun dismissed claims from New Jersey, Pennsylvania, Maryland, and Oklahoma. The FTC accuses Amazon of raising prices with an algorithm, which it allegedly stopped using in 2019.
content: The U.S. Federal Trade Commission's case accusing Amazon of stifling competition in online retail will move forward, though some of the states that sued alongside the agency had their claims dismissed, court documents showed.
